item.description:
Shelley has offered to host a party at her house at 7:00pm on Saturday Feb 28. Space is limited, so rsvp soon. No need for the following persons to rsvp: Shelley, Janet, Carlo, Miguel Angel, Lorenzo, Tiziana (+1), Sheryl Lacoursiere (+1), Jennifer Rafferty. There are only 13 spots left.

Shelley is taking care of the food. Each person (or couple) is asked to bring a bottle of Italian wine. Also, as Meetup.com charges an annual fee for each group (which Lorenzo has been paying out of his own pocket), we are using this occasion to raise funds for the next fee payment - $5.00 per person (couple). Non c'e male per cibo gratuita!

Directions will be sent only to those who are signed up to attend. IF YOUR PLANS CHANGE YOU MUST LET ME KNOW SO THAT WE CAN MAKE THE SPACE AVAILABLE. Email me at jdelnegro@hotmail.com or simply change your response on the website.
item.name: La Festa Viticoltura
